Author: piipiistorm
Text: I was told no exercise for a few days and no lifting weights for at least a week. I'd keep your blood pressure down to prevent the clot from popping out  Idk about your pain tolerance, but the second I got out of surgery, I had whataburger to pad my stomach out for antibiotics. Those pills made my stomach turn really bad so I had to eat loads of carbs and sugars for it to stay down. Just be mindful of how your eating and drinking so you dont get a dry socket
